# particleRenderOrder

**Instance Property**

The order in which the emitter’s particles are rendered.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var particleRenderOrder: SKParticleRenderOrder { get set }
```

```swift
var particleRenderOrder: SKParticleRenderOrder { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKParticleRenderOrder/oldestLast].

## Controlling the Rendering Order of an Emitter’s Particles

- **SKParticleRenderOrder**: The order to use when the emitter’s particles are rendered.
